title: Cord With Tassels, late 16th–early 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: A long cord completely covered with knotting and braiding, to which are attached two equally large tassels arranged in tiers of elaborate knotting and braiding.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cord With Tassels, late 16th–early 17th century. Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-51-1.
